titleStmt.title: Theater dv mond sef ivv. Gorsedd y byd lle i gellir gvveled trueni a lefcnid noran y corph ai o-didavvgrvvydd [sic] o ran yr enaid, a scrifenvvyd gynt yn y Phrangaeg ag a gyfiathvvyd i'r gymraeg drvvy lafyr Rosier Smyth o dref lanelvvy athravv o theologyddiaeth..
Theatre du monde
titleStmt.author: Boaistuau, Pierre, d. 1566.
Smyth, Roger, 1541-1624 or 5.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 207, 208, 241, and 279 are numbered 208, 206, 238, and 289 respectively.
Imperfect: stained, torn and worn, and with faded print, resulting in loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Wales.
